sentences: Bangor Flying Circus consisted of David "Hawk" Wolinski (bass, keyboards, vocals), Alan "Addison Al" DeCarlo (guitar, vocals), and Tom Schiffour (drums), who was replaced in late 1968 by former H.P. Lovecraft member Michael Tegza (drums, percussion).
Wolinski and Schiffour had previously been in the Shadows of Knight.
They put out one self-titled album in 1969, which peaked at number 190 on Billboard 200.
